121212112.content:
Even thought Amy just started peeing, she opens the door for her desperate friend, both because Amy doesn't want her own panties to get wet and because she cares for her friend Cream.

However, the shock Cream feels as she sees her own body wetting her panties on the toilet in front of her makes her lose control over her bladder entirely, releashing a torrent of pee into Amy's white panties, making Cream sob and kneel to the floor.
Although Amy is upset about what happened to her body, she quickly regains her composure and pats Cream on the head reassuringly to make her feel better.

After Amy and Cream are done peeing in their panties and Creams calms down, Cream asks Amy why their bodies are switched, and Amy replies with "I'm not sure, but I think it has something to do with the power of chaos emeralds." Both Amy and Cream decide to keep pretending to be who they appear to be until they find a way to fix it, and then they change into dry panties and go back to sleep at their respective homes.
